. @ BerlinPolicy I have learned to expect the unexpected. New security threats can arise quickly. Readiness is key. # I140c.

. @ BerlinPolicy a photo of Anna Lindh. A dear friend, from teenage years through her tenure than Swedish foreign min. I honored her memory.
@ BerlinPolicy as many #NATO colleagues will agree, just getting to work can sometimes be an adventure - Brussels traffic is famous # i140c.
@ BerlinPolicy In Norway, lunch is @ 11am. At the time of Belgian lunch time, I am hungry for a good meal & discussion. I rarely eat alone.
. @ BerlinPolicy I will visit every #NATO country. Everywhere I stress that NATO will defend all allies against any threat # i140c.
. @ BerlinPolicy support UKR politically & practically, including 5 trust funds. Call on Russia: respect the UKR sovereignty & territorial integrity.
@ rabben44 sounds great! Still a little long for lunch here.
. @ BerlinPolicy #NATO has suspended practical coop w Russia, but we keep political and mil-to-mil channels open # i140c.
. @ BerlinPolicy I love to go cross country skiing, but not really that easy in Brussels. Instead, biking in the woods # i140c.

. @ BerlinPolicy extremism to # NATO's south. It has inspired attacks in our streets. We must fight terrorism and stand up for our open societies

In 2014 the number of people in work Grew by 1% in the EU, the Highest annual growth rate since 2008. But nt is still too high. #EC
Today is a very important day in my second government. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
We are here not only to announce great numbers and ambitious projects, but to renew our commitment to the development of our Country.
To say, based on concrete data and actions, that # OBrasilVaiSeguirAvanzando
To remind us once again that, for us, development means investment, employment, income and quality of life.
It means ability to grow, work and produce. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
If the difficulties are great, the energy and disposition of the Brazilian people - and their democratic government - are greater.
(...) to make our country move forward. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
Our government is not 4 months, but 4 years! So we're on the starting line and not on the finish line! #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
The launch of the Logistics Investment Plan 2015-2018, in its first stage, is part of this rush # OBrasilVaiSeguirAvanzando
It is not only the continuity of the successful set of concessions made in my first term (...)
(...) but, above all, it is the opening for an even better future. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
Like any large set of investments in logistics, its effects will be multiple across the production chain. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
Tune in at 11:50 a.m. ET to watch the President discuss how #Obamacare has improved our health care system: http://t.co/UaLtzkNlMV
The new concessions in highways, railways, ports and airports will mobilize investments around R $ 198.4 billion (...)
(...) directly benefiting 20 states and 130 Brazilian municipalities. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
These numbers underpin four positive and promising political actions: an expansion of partnership between government and private initiative;
a response to the challenges we have in the logistics infrastructure in our country;
an articulated action with governors in favor of regional development;
and a reaffirmation of the commitment of our 2nd gov to invest to resume economic growth. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
We are making concessions to build, grow and develop. Especially to increase the opportunities to work and produce.
Our concessions model is anchored in two premises: guarantee of quality services, with fair prices for users;
(...) and adequate compensation to the concessionaires for their investments and the services they will provide. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
Our goals are: to increase the rate of investment and to make the services + efficient, with reduction of costs and tariffs.
We will also ensure, as we did in the previous stage, legal certainty for investors, with clear and clear regulatory frameworks.
Social aspects Should be incorporated into a Broader range of our police and not treated in isolation. #EC http://t.co/DjHpGh7kKe
#Social partners Should be consulted on a Broader range of Policies than in the past - from the digital energy affairs #EC
#EU Legislation has to be evaluated and the modernised of reflect our evolving Economies and societies - #EC will come with proposals this year.
Aging is the key challenge. Today we have 4 people of working age for every person over 65. By 2060, it's estimated to That there will be the second
It is not only in good weather that the future is built, the bridges and foundations + solids of the future are built in times of difficulty
Great nations are only firm when they know, when adapting to the new realities, overcome obstacles imposed by them, building new ways.
Our great nation needs, today, this double initiative. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
A huge effort of macroeconomic and fiscal stability to transform our actions into weapons to overcome the crisis that we are going through.
At the same time a fantastic investment effort to mobilize us in the construction of a productive + Country (...)
(...) lower costs and benefit from a modern infrastructure. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
Brazilian and Brazilian, the more we unite, the faster we will beat the staples. #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
Long live Brazil! Live the future of our people! #BrasilFollowFollowingAbout
